about_the_game:
Things that go bump in the night are nothing new to the town of Lunaris. It's time to get the gang back together and help a ghoul in need in this LGBTQ+ Visual Novel DLC. Step back into the shoes of the Hunter and investigate a haunting happening in the Lunarian woodland with your colleagues August and Piper and get some help from the resident creatures of the night in a comedic mini-tale created over the course of just four weeks! This was a small love letter to our supporters who were missing the characters as much as we were. Playtime is an average of about 40 minutes - 1 hour.

FEATURES

- Choose your pronouns
- Revisit the romances from WTNC
- 1 new unlockable CG
- Partially voiced (character names + reactionary noises only)
